title: Political culture is society's attitude to govt.

content.question: Political culture is best defined as the

choices.label: establishment of "party lines" about cultural affairs in authoritarian states
tendency of bureaucrats to defend conservative policies regardless of the policy preferences of elected officials
tendency of politicians to adopt centralist positions once they are elected to office
prevailing attitudes in a society toward government, authority, and participation
ways in which political values are transferred to children in a society

content.answer: prevailing attitudes in a society toward government, authority, and participation

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
